greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, self-convolution of A161361, row sums = A000521
comment: Sum of n-th row terms = A000521(n-1).
formula: Antidiagonals of a table, A161361^2, where A161361 = the convolution square root of A000521.
example: First few rows of the triangle =
Take antidiagonals such that row 2 = (29250, 138384, 29250), sum = 196884
results.author: Gary W. Adamson and _Alexander R. Povolotsky_, Jun 07 2009
